articles.title: About this site
articles.description: This website shows the visual projects done as part of MITB ISSS608.

articles.title: Visual Analytics
articles.description: Welcome to the website created in MITB ISSS608 Data Analytics and Visualisation using R and Tableau.
articles.contents:
This webpage consist of a demonstration of my in-class and take-home exercises and assignments using Rmarkdown distill article template and Tableau.
In-class exercises are mostly performed using Tableau. Take home exercises are to replicate the same charts using R
